title: Marriage blanket (Arkila kerka)
description: six strips sewn together; dark blue, cream, rust and tan; stripes and geometric designs with various triangle and diamond motifs; eight rows of tan and rust looped tassels; strips tacked together with space between stitches
creditline: Gift of Joseph Landsberger in honor of his mother Blanche Dvorak Landsberger and his partner Steven O. Shimer
